Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.StatusRoles
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
[Group("statusroles", "Manage roles that are assigned when a user has a specific status.")]
public class SlashStatusRoles : MewdekoSlashModuleBase<StatusRolesService>, IInteractionModuleBase
